d:
The Cute Girl from my school is still hypnotized (Chapters 01-08)

I'll continue posting this comic monthly until its conclusion. Enjoying the series? Join me on my support pages for early access to 15 extra chapters and other exclusive comics. Your support helps me keep creating more stories!
